settings.richtext: Please note that we do NOT share our mailing list with any third parties. You may unsubscribe at any time.

settings.title: Amazing Grace™
settings.subtext: Amazing Grace provides multiple wellness benefits, including neurologic, anti-anxiety, anti-inflammatory, and analgesic properties.

settings.title: Peace™
settings.subtext: Peace is formulated specifically for those who suffer from anxiety-related conditions, including Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder, social anxiety and depression.

settings.title: Animal Kingdom™
settings.subtext: Animal Kingdom is a 100% organic full-spectrum hemp extract that provides a wide range of wellness benefits for all mammals, including common household pets.

settings.title: Slumber™
settings.subtext: Slumber is formulated to provide you with a good night’s sleep. Its blend of cannabinoids and terpenes is crafted to help those suffering from a wide range of sleep conditions.

settings.title: Soar To New Heights
settings.content:
Our stories are personal. We know what it's like to lose faith. Persist.

WINGS™ offers an array of phytonutrients to help your body to support itself naturally and organically. While cures are still hard to come by, we may be able to help you (or someone you love) feel and function better.

Let us lift you up. Let us give you WINGS™.

settings.testimonial: "We’ve been using WINGS for about 7 months with nothing but success. We’ve been able to maintain seizure control, get great sleep, and crush several milestones. Our neurologist is thrilled with Tuck’s progress and helped us wean from all other medications! For a family that lives in a constant state of chaos and unknown, WINGS has given us a little stability and peace of mind."
settings.name: The Smith Family

settings.testimonial: "We have seen so much improvement in our every day lives. With our daughter having special needs, even normal activities were very stressful for all of us, but not anymore. Now we are able to do new things and be around people without melt downs. We have seen a calmness in our daughter that we never did before. The constant need to move or bounce has reduced tremendously! I’m impressed by the increased attention and focus our daughter has now. Our sleep has never been better!"
settings.name: Leah Davis

settings.testimonial: "One year after a long fundraising campaign in New Zealand to afford to put my son on a pharmaceutical-grade, isolated CBD product, we came to a point where it was no longer sustainable and needed another option. That is how we found the amazing product “WINGS.” Not only did this product cost a fraction of the price, it was more effective and at much smaller doses. Not only did we receive more support, this product has far more knowledge surrounding it. I can say with confidence, as a mother of a 3 year old with special needs, this product is a miracle, not only for Angelman Syndrome but for children like my son."
settings.name: Jaimie A

settings.title: Wings Takes a Different Approach
settings.content: We combine organic, USA-grown hemp extract with natural, food-grade terpenes and medium-chain triglyceride (MCT) oil  to maximize on the beneficial molecules that come from the cannabis sativa plant. We aim to enhance the Entourage Effect to its fullest. Because of this, WINGS has extremely low dosing and maximum effect.

settings.title: A New Approach To CBD Supplements
settings.text: We combine organic, USA-grown hemp extract with natural, food-grade terpenes and medium-chain triglyceride (MCT) oil  to maximize on the beneficial molecules that come from the cannabis sativa plant. We aim to enhance the Entourage Effect to its fullest. Because of this, WINGS has extremely low dosing and maximum effect.

settings.title: Liquified Gas Extraction Technology
settings.text: WINGS utilizes liquified gas extraction technology to obtain our hemp extract from the whole hemp plant. WINGS is your source for products with the most current scientific findings, innovation and technology. Our products are 3rd-party tested for extensive analysis of cannabinoids, terpenes, heavy metals, pesticides and more.
